update.description:
builds on top of pull request #285 and depends on:

* ~~pull request #304~~
* ~~pull request #306~~

The Scene3D plugin is ported from ign-gui and updated to use the rendering component added in pull request #306 so that gui and sensors systems in ign-gazebo can now share the same rendering code

Screenshot from running `fuel_textured_mesh.sdf` world

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1832278947-Screenshot%20from%202019-05-06%2015-52-54.png)
update.title: Port Scene3D gui plugin

content.raw:
I separated the changes out to a different PR:

[#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/328](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/328)
content.html:
I separated the changes out to a different PR:

#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/328

content.raw: Sounds good.  I can call it `GzScene3D`. Will also need to update the example worlds in ign-gazebo
content.html: Sounds good. I can call it GzScene3D. Will also need to update the example worlds in ign-gazebo

content.raw: @nkoenig [3c1a618](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/3c1a618731a6d60c8153f4b61d3c6cb665cc09ce) fixes the edgar mine texture mapping problem. Tested with the original edgar.dae, e.g. version 2 of the edgar model:`https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/openrobotics/models/Edgar Mine Virtual STIX/2`
content.html: @nkoenig 3c1a618 fixes the edgar mine texture mapping problem. Tested with the original edgar.dae, e.g. version 2 of the edgar model:https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/1.0/openrobotics/models/Edgar Mine Virtual STIX/2

content.raw: We should give the plugin another name to prevent collision with Ignition GUI. In the SDF, users are passing just `Scene3D`, which comes from `libScene3D.so`.
content.html: We should give the plugin another name to prevent collision with Ignition GUI. In the SDF, users are passing just Scene3D, which comes from libScene3D.so.

content.raw:
[7facdd1](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/7facdd1c86c80261cdb6713057d60bed3b1e1408) fixes this crash.

I noticed another crash from ign gazebo gui. Not sure if you’ve seen it before but here’s the backtrace. it’s somewhere deep down when destroying the qml engine.

```
#0  0x00007ffff3a43cd7 in  () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#1  0x00007ffff3c39fce in QQmlPropertyCache::~QQmlPropertyCache() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#2  0x00007ffff3c3a419 in QQmlPropertyCache::~QQmlPropertyCache() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#3  0x00007ffff3c0a745 in QQmlMetaType::freeUnusedTypesAndCaches() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#4  0x00007ffff3bdf272 in QQmlEnginePrivate::~QQmlEnginePrivate() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#5  0x00007ffff3c71649 in QQmlApplicationEnginePrivate::~QQmlApplicationEnginePrivate() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#6  0x00007ffff1ff5a13 in QObject::~QObject() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#7  0x00007ffff3be3980 in QQmlEngine::~QQmlEngine() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#8  0x00007ffff3c717b9 in QQmlApplicationEngine::~QQmlApplicationEngine() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#9  0x00007ffff48486d6 in ignition::gui::Application::~Application() (this=0x7fffffffc560, __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/c++/8/bits/unique_ptr.h:334
```
content.html:
7facdd1 fixes this crash.

I noticed another crash from ign gazebo gui. Not sure if you’ve seen it before but here’s the backtrace. it’s somewhere deep down when destroying the qml engine.

#0  0x00007ffff3a43cd7 in  () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#1  0x00007ffff3c39fce in QQmlPropertyCache::~QQmlPropertyCache() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#2  0x00007ffff3c3a419 in QQmlPropertyCache::~QQmlPropertyCache() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#3  0x00007ffff3c0a745 in QQmlMetaType::freeUnusedTypesAndCaches() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#4  0x00007ffff3bdf272 in QQmlEnginePrivate::~QQmlEnginePrivate() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#5  0x00007ffff3c71649 in QQmlApplicationEnginePrivate::~QQmlApplicationEnginePrivate() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#6  0x00007ffff1ff5a13 in QObject::~QObject() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5
#7  0x00007ffff3be3980 in QQmlEngine::~QQmlEngine() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#8  0x00007ffff3c717b9 in QQmlApplicationEngine::~QQmlApplicationEngine() () at /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Qml.so.5
#9  0x00007ffff48486d6 in ignition::gui::Application::~Application() (this=0x7fffffffc560, __in_chrg=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/c++/8/bits/unique_ptr.h:334

content.raw:
Getting a crash here on shutdown. Backtrace:

~~~
#0  __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff7574801 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79
#2  0x00007ffff00d08b7 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6

#4  0x00007ffff00d6a41 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6

#6  0x00007ffff00d2769 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#7  0x00007fffb9a98447 in std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_create (__old_capacity=0, this=<optimized out>, 
    __capacity=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.tcc:138
#8  std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU", 
    __end=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.tcc:219
#9  std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct_aux<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU", 
    __end=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.h:236
#10 std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU",

#13 0x00007fffb9ce9dfb in ignition::gazebo::v2::IgnRenderer::Destroy (this=0x555556d7b470) at /home/developer/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:253
#14 0x00007fffb9cea6d5 in ignition::gazebo::v2::RenderThread::ShutDown (this=0x555556d7b450) at /home/developer/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:339

content.html:
Getting a crash here on shutdown. Backtrace:

#0  __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff7574801 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79
#2  0x00007ffff00d08b7 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6

#6  0x00007ffff00d2769 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#7  0x00007fffb9a98447 in std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_create (__old_capacity=0, this=<optimized out>, 
    __capacity=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.tcc:138
#8  std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU", 
    __end=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.tcc:219
#9  std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct_aux<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU", 
    __end=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.h:236
#10 std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU",
